title: Bug 109718: Tips shows the content in one line when putting large content in text item
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips show in given format
Actual Result: Tips show in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips show the content in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should retain the given format when large content is placed in a text item.
SR:
1. Launch the application
2. Put a large content in a text item
3. Save the changes
4. Place the mouse cursor on the text item to see the tips
5. Note that the tips show the content in one line instead of preserving the original format.
